text: Brian van Goethem (born 16 April 1991) is a Dutch professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . In August 2019, he was named in the startlist for the 2019 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2013 : 1st Zuid Oost Drenthe Classic II : 3rd De Kustpijl : 6th Zuid Oost Drenthe Classic I ;2014 : 1st Stage 1 (TTT) Czech Cycling Tour : 3rd Ster van Zwolle : 4th Overall Tour de Gironde : 5th Duo Normand (with Peter Koning) : 8th Ronde van Drenthe : 9th Overall Olympia's Tour ;2016 : 6th Schaal Sels ;2017 : 3rd Omloop van het Houtland : 9th Arnhem–Veenendaal Classic ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2019 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |- style="text- align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |DNF |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male cyclists Category:People from Terneuzen Category:Sportspeople from Zeeland Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Brian van Goethem
